mapper.select: SELECT B.AUTH_ID AS authId, C.RESOURCE_ID AS resourceId, C.RESOURCE_NM AS resourceNm, C.RESOURCE_TYPE AS resourceType, C.RESOURCE_URL AS resourceUrl FROM AUTHORITIES A, AUTH_RESOURCE B, RESOURCES C WHERE A.AUTH_ID = B.AUTH_ID AND B.RESOURCE_ID = C.RESOURCE_ID AND C.RESOURCE_TYPE IN ('01','02') AND C.RESOURCE_URL IS NOT NULL ORDER BY B.AUTH_ID, C.RESOURCE_URL DESC
